timeline.bodyText:
Would you be willing to break this out into its own utility class? Maybe in access-common. And then add a unit test for it so we can verify the behavior in a number of variations. I can help with the unit test if you would like, this just seems like something that is testable and would benefit from it.
Some cases I would like to test:

Empty mods element
Mods document with a single top level element which is empty
Empty top level element
Empty nested element
Empty element with attributes
Document with multiple elements, 1 populated, 1 empty, 1 populated (to verify that both the preceding and succeeding elements are not lost or cause an error)
Element containing only white space
Triple nested empty element (for example, name/alternativeName/namePart)
Top level element containing two children, one empty, one populated
